dsgvo-und-datenschutzkonformitaet.intro:
Data protection and privacy are close to our hearts.
That is why we ensure a high level of transparency and the best possible security for your data on a wide range of levels.

infos.headline: Server location in Germany
infos.text:
The data processing takes place in Germany. Bookingflix is located in Germany and we strictly follow the European GDPR. Thus, all data is located on servers within Germany. The greatest possible data and legal security are thus guaranteed.
We rely on the global market leader AWS with its high-performance and secured server structure.

infos.headline: Regular backups
infos.text: Your data is safe. Calendars are backed up several times a day to different backup servers.

infos.headline: Order data processing
infos.text: We will be happy to conclude an order data processing agreement with you. This regulates all important aspects of data processing, data security and technical and organizational measures relating to the topics relevant to the GDPR. We will be happy to send you a sample of the contract in advance.

infos.headline: Verification of your customers
infos.text: The identity and authenticity of all booking customers is verified by email-based verification. This allows spam entries and false bookings to be circumvented. This type of verification is part of the GDPR-compliant booking process. Alternatively, however, for example for internal bookings within your company, you can also deactivate the verification.

infos.headline: Encryption and firewall
infos.text: For data transmission we use the latest encryption technology according to HTTPS standard. Only with your explicit consent, for example in support matters, we can view details about your bookings or customers. Our server hoster AWS offers further security measures. We will be happy to send you detailed information on this. Also in the form of the order data processing contract.

infos.headline: Deletion periods
infos.text: After 30 days, past appointment data will be deleted. Earlier deletion is open to you. You will be informed by email before the deletion. If needed, you can backup the data in advance.
